law.catch_line: An individual who is appointed to fill a vacancy in an office for which a statement is required by ®..
law.text: An individual who is appointed to fill a vacancy in an office for which a statement is required by § 15-601(a) of this subtitle, and who has not already filed a statement under § 15-602 of this subtitle for the preceding calendar year, shall file the statement within 30 days after appointment.
